5261.quoteText: In addition to cookies, we may also use other similar tracking technologies on our services.
5261.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: The Cookie Policy states that they use Web Beacons (also called "tracking pixels", "internet tags", "pixel tags" or "clear gifs"), Embedded Scripts, Device Fingerprinting, and Local Storage.

5262.quoteText: Geo-Location Information: Some devices allow applications to access real-time location-based information (for example, GPS (global positioning systems) software, geo-filtering, and other location-aware technologies) to locate (sometimes precisely) you for purposes such as verifying your location and delivering or restricting relevant content based on your location. We may use this information to optimize your experience.
5262.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

5264.quoteText: First party cookies are our own cookies set by Humble Bundle, controlled by us and used to provide information about the usage of the Service.
5264.title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

5265.quoteText: Analytics Cookies allow us to improve our services by collecting information about your use of the Service. We use these cookies to help improve how the website works. For example, Analytics Cookies show us statistics, which are the most frequently visited pages on the Service, help us record any difficulties you have with the Service, and show us whether our advertising is effective or not. We cannot identify you personally through the use of these cookies, but third parties who provide these cookies may be able to.
5265.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

5266.quoteText: We do not respond to "do not track" signals at this time.
5266.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

5267.quoteText: Behavioral Advertising Cookies: Behavioral Advertising Cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements to users both on and off the Service. Our partners may use a cookie to determine whether an ad has been shown to you and how it performed. A partner may also show you an ad on or off the Service after you have visited a partner's site or application.
5267.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

5268.quoteText: Please check the websites of these third parties for details on how they use cookies.
5268.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

5269.quoteText:
2.
What Categories of Information We May Process Summary
5269.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

5270.quoteText:
4.
How We Collect or Create Information Summary
5270.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

5271.quoteText:
li>
  • Legal Compliance: Subject to applicable law, we reserve the right to release information concerning any user of Services when we have grounds to believe that the user is in violation of our Terms and Conditions or other published guidelines or has engaged in (or we have grounds to believe is engaging in) any illegal activity, and to release information in response to court and governmental orders, other requests from government entities, civil subpoenas, discovery requests and otherwise as required by law or regulatory obligations. We also may release information about users when we believe in good faith that such release is in the interest of protecting the rights, property, safety or security of Humble Bundle, any of our users or the public, or to respond to an emergency.
5271.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
